website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive choice considering you get 2 bags for the price; however, they come with some concerns about their longevity.
pros: A pack of 2 nut milk bags that are made of BPA-free nylon in a practical size
Bottoms are rounded and fit fairly large portions
Affordably priced, plus you get access to a free recipe e-book to get you started
cons: Pulp and other small pieces get stuck in the seams, which tend to come apart after several uses

customer_reviews.title: did not last
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed this did not last. I made soymilk and the 2nd time I made soymilk, the bag split in half and all the contents spilled.
customer_reviews.author: LOUELLA ROBERSON

customer_reviews.title: Effective and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the 2-pack Go Nuts nut milk bag for draining the whey out of homemade yogurt. At first glance, I thought the fabric (“mesh”) might be too fine for that purpose, but it drained really well. Once it was drained, the smoothness of the fabric enabled the thick yogurt to be dumped out of the bag easily and cleanly. So much easier than trying to drain it through cheese cloth layers – and it’s reusable. The size of this bag is a perfect fit to hang inside my 1/2 gallon juice pitcher while the yogurt is draining (with a few clothes pins to hold it up). It cleans easily and dries quickly too.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonWoman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Substitute for a Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Used this product yesterday to make juice rather than a smoothie. Instead of having to buy another expensive product that would take up kitchen space I took a chance on this bag. So happy I did. I blended 4 whole apples in my nutribullet and poured the blended apples into the bag. I was able to twist the bag ridiculously tight and the bag did not bust. I got the driest pulp imaginable and a cheap juicer out of this product! Do not hesitate to buy.
customer_reviews.author: La Educada

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after researching reusable alternatives to cheesecloth, and I'm well-pleased with the results. I used one to squeeze out excess water from zucchini, and my eventual casserole was a hit at Easter lunch because I was able to remove so much moisture. I'm looking forward to straining broths through these bags, too. Clean-up was easy, as I just used a bit of dish-washing liquid to hand wash the bag before letting it air dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Bugg

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. It is large enough to handle straining a half gallon of milk. It is strong enough to allow you to twist and strain the milk from the pulp completely. Clean up is a breeze. I just turned it inside out and washed with dishwashing liquid, rinsed and counter dried. Great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Billy W Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cold brew and horchata
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast, high quality, super easy to clean, very effective and efficient at filtering cold brew coffee and homemade horchata, which both have very small particles. Soooo much better than coffee filters, towels or cheese cloth. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BAGS!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love my bags. I did not use it for nut milk yet. I had some kefir and no cheesecloth at hand so I used one of these. It worked perfectly and cleaned up very nicely. My family loves nut milks and I am making some now so I will be using the bags for what I bought them for! The kids also love kefir and since I strained the grains with the bag last night the kids are eagerly awaiting their favorite flavor of kefir. The dogs like theirs plain. I think this is a great product and will probably buy another package since I use them so much.
customer_reviews.author: MayaTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cold brew coffee and cold brew tea!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found something that works great, rinses easily and dries in a flash! Love it. Especially for my ice tea...make it. Strain it in a strainer then when its cool strain it through this. Otherwise I just fill it with the right amount if loose tea leaves and cold brew in it. Really truly beats the muslim and organic cotton by a longshot. Very open so the tea and water mingle freely. Rinse well, roll in paper towel then hang to dry...finished
customer_reviews.author: DianaruTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for making almond milk
customer_reviews.text: I love these bags!!! I wanted to make almond milk and they worked perfect. The first batch I made without straining it. Then I ordered the bags and made a second batch. The difference was amazing. The bag does a great job at straining the grit but till maintaining the flavor of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow that's good!
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent quality material. It's strong and very smooth. Feels like silk. I'm very strong and I really put it to the test as I made coconut milk this week. I wrung out that coconut inside that bag with all my strength. I was amazed at the strength of this bag which didn't show any signs of wear after use. It is also made of very flexible material so less messy to clean up when I dump out the used coconut.
customer_reviews.author: Ether Bunny

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money on those
customer_reviews.text: First time using one of the bags to make nut milk, and got stuff stuck between the seems. I couldn't find a way to get it out. It's good for just a single use.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: ... use these bags with my Norwalk juicer and absolutely love them - they are the best bags I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these bags with my Norwalk juicer and absolutely love them - they are the best bags I have purchased so far. They are durable and have not yet ripped (unlike other milk and juicing bags I have purchased). The draw string hooks around the Norwalk machine for easy set up and clean up. The bags are also super easy to clean (unlike other bags) and they make smooth juice. I have been juicing for years and this is the best product I have used so far! Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Scrufari

customer_reviews.title: No nuts in my bag
customer_reviews.text: Works well, I don't use it for nut milk, I use it for making my cold brew coffee. Helluva lot cheaper than they want in stores and, personally, better. Nice tight mesh, no grounds getting through. Easy cleaning. The coffee does stain it, but then coffee stains everything.
customer_reviews.author: C. Jett

customer_reviews.title: Good steeping bag for large batches of ciders, teas, and
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get this to make nut milk, but to mull cider and wines. It's a nice bag, and doesn't leave a lot of silt in my beverage, which I like. It does stain easily, but that doesn't bother me. It is hard to tie it really tight so that small particles don't escape through the top, but if I'm careful, it doesn't let too much escape.
customer_reviews.author: Adri

customer_reviews.title: Seams leaked pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed for the first two uses of the first bag in the package. Then the seams started to give up like mini geysers. Tried the second bag and on the first use the seams did the same. Darn. Waste of money/time. I guess its really a one-star, but I don't want to go down as "hating" something as non- life threatening as a nut bag.
customer_reviews.author: H. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Busted!
customer_reviews.text: the first time I used the first bad it was fine, second time it busted. Then I threw it away and used the second bag and was extra careful not to squeeze too hard,(I rinsed the bags out in between each pour so more of the liquid can get through too). The second bag busted! Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Lankford

customer_reviews.title: These nut bags are so great and so durable
customer_reviews.text: These nut bags are so great and so durable! They feel like they are very well made and will not break and tear even with excessive squeezing and twisting. I've been using this to make almond milk and I would say that it's a pretty fine mesh, so not many of the nuts will go through. You really need to squeeze hard as you get more and more liquid out. I do appreciate this quality about it though because I do like my nut milks to be without the gritty bits.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Wu

customer_reviews.title: Pulp gets stuck in the seams, but it's still the best nut bag I could find.
customer_reviews.text: I love the material - it's going to last forever and does not get moldy like cotton bags, but.. 3 stars unfortunately, as nut pulp gets stuck in the seams and is very, very hard to get out.
customer_reviews.author: GG8

customer_reviews.title: Great For Straining Pulp
customer_reviews.text: The nut bags work great. I have purchased 3 sets because I have given to of them away. I have a Vitamix but can't eat a lot of fiber so I juice a lot of my fruits and vegetables. I have also made almond milk and then strained the pulp. These bags are great for straining and are easily washed and dry very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Much cheaper than a juicer!!
customer_reviews.text: I put cucumbers in the blender then put the pulp and liquid into the nut bag and squeeze out the juice I also did it with celery. It works very well and you can use the pulp for added fiber to soups stews baked goods so I'm loving it!!! I've been looking at buying the juicer but now I don't need one I can just use my blender and run it through this nutbag!!! I'm so happy with this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good for Strained Kratom tea
customer_reviews.text: Good for Kratom powder to make strained tea! I boil water and put powdered product in, and let the tea set overnight in water I had brought to a boil. To potentiate the tea I add turmeric and pepper - but the turmeric has stained the bag yellow. Very little powder gets through the bag. But - it some get through! I recommend straining it one final time after it’s been brewed through cheese cloth into a final container.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I use for making cold brew coffee and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use for making cold brew coffee and haven't had any of the coffee sneak through (I use coarse ground beans). Since it's stained, that one is designated just for coffee now. The other is used mostly for straining my homemade yogurt to create thicker greek-style yogurt. Rather than hanging from a cabinet handle like some do, I place the bag in a strainer sitting on top of a bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is so soft! The first thing I wanted to do was rub it across my face and thought this would make a nice pillow case. Haha. This is my first time getting a nut bag. I actually am using it to strain celery for celery juice. Thanks for the PDF.
customer_reviews.author: Rena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made nut bag.so far it has more than met my needs. I just strained coffee grounds after making cold brew coffee and not one coffee ground was in my cup! It is very easy to wash and dries quickly. A very nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Shelf Tamer

customer_reviews.title: Best nut milk bag yet!
customer_reviews.text: I've been making coconut milk once a week for over 3 years now and this is by far the best nut milk bad I've ever used. The seams are strong and the mesh is nice and fine. I feel that a good nut milk bag should last 6 months minimum with weekly use so I'll report back when the time comes. For now, I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Megalicious

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Makes cold brew super easy. Wish it had a better way to close, like a plastic stop, instead I wrap the string around and the it off. Also, coffe grinds tend to get stuck inside where the string is stiched in, but if I run under water, it makes is way out. Quicker than old method of filtering and brew is plenty robust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are really big so you can get a lot done at once!
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest doing this over a bowl rather than a mason jar I messed up the first time that was my own fault. It does come in a plastic bag but you could probably repurpose it use it for something else. The Milk bags are so easy to cleanjust a little bit of rinsing I put a little tiny bit of soap they probably don't even need it and then just set it out to dry with the rest of my dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size and quality!
customer_reviews.text: These bags are large enough to dump the contents of a full blender in making less of a mess trying to fit it into a smaller bag. I have used these for just about anything; almond milk, celery juice, and vegetable stock. They are easy to clean but they are slightly discolored from use, this does not affect the product at all. They are great quality too! If you want a larger nut milk bag that is good quality these are it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I was tired of the other disposable cheese cloths. I used these to make a cannabis salve for pain. It strained the oil perfectly and I only had to strain it through once! Definitely saved some time. I set the bag in a tall cup and let it strain by itself before I squeezed. It cleaned easily and dried good. I will trying it out with regular milk for ricotta too.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: The bags are very well made of very fine mesh and the rounded bottom makes it easier to ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to make kefir cheese. The bags are very well made of very fine mesh and the rounded bottom makes it easier to strain the kefir and clean the bag.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: I do
customer_reviews.text: This’s a horrible product. It’s almost impossible to clean 100%. So, even after cleaning it, you’ll always have oil dripping after having squeezed the coconut. Buy some other brand. This’s no good.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Cash

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use and wash!
customer_reviews.text: These little milk bags are great! I make Almond milk one a week, using organic raw almonds or organic raw almond butter. I find straining the milk made with almond butter is much better if you strain it through the milk bag, like the one made with almonds! These bags are easy to use and wash! They are very sturdy! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Product is just what I needed for making almond milk. I make small amounts, about 2-1/2 cups at a time so the bags are overkill for size. But they do the job and are easy to clean. SO MUCH easier to use than cheesecloth. Price is reasonable for the quality - good weight material, not cheesecloth but nylon.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t give 5 stars for easy to clean only because that is a little challenge. I threw mine in the dishwasher and they collected all the yuck and didn’t wash. You deff need to wash by hand with soap and lay to dry which isn’t difficult at all. These are very durable. I make coconut milk with these and I ring and ring them and they are awesome. I like that I can hold with one hand and dump the liquid in without a mess. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Olson

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I just started making my own nut milk and early on realized I needed the right equipment. Go Nuts milk bags were the right choice for me. They are sturdy, easy to use and extremely easy to clean. My almond milk goes from pulpy to a beautiful, creamy white in one trip through the filter. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: terrie

customer_reviews.title: but more time intensive than I liked. After researching the sprouting bag method
customer_reviews.text: I use my GO NUTS nut bag for sprouting one of the healthiest seeds of all, broccoli! I’ve been using traditional methods with a ball jar and a sprouting cap, which was okay, but more time intensive than I liked. After researching the sprouting bag method, I was convinced bags would be more convenient and compatible with my daily routine. I tried the NUT BAG, using broccoli and other favorite seeds, and have not been disappointed at all in how it’s changed the way I do healthy living. I call them SPROUTING BAGS!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Why these bags are the best...
customer_reviews.text: 1. The size and rounded corners make these bags easier to handle, fit and strain. 2. Thoughtful inside out design ensures that pulp does not get trapped in the seams. 3 (my favorite feature). Soft, flexible and easy to clean fabric. 4. They hold up extremely with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Celery Juice extraction
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to clean and dries almost immediately. I used it for making celery juice. You can squeeze that pulp almost completely dry. Don't know about durability I've only been using everyday for a week now and it looks brand new. Plus theres two in the pack.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: This did exactly what was needed and the yogurt is much better now.
customer_reviews.text: Made Yogurt and online it was suggested to use this for straining. Laughed when the wife asked for a nutbag but what guy wouldn't. This did exactly what was needed and the yogurt is much better now.
customer_reviews.author: conner

customer_reviews.title: Best Nut MIlk Bag
customer_reviews.text: The milk bag is ok. It did take awhile to squeeze the liquid through the bag which I thought to be a little time consuming. However, it was my first time and I wasn't quite sure that I knew what I was doing:-) I've since made several batches of Almond Milk but used a commercial stainless steel strainer basket. Much quicker results and NO residue from the pulverized almonds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for Cheesecloth
customer_reviews.text: Bought this originally to produce coconut milk. It is extremely great in squeezing water out of zucchini prior to baking and tofu in preparation for cooking. Easy to clean and dry for the next time. Less messy than a cheesecloth and cost effective since it is reusable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nuts to milk
customer_reviews.text: I have been making nut milk for several years and tried cheesecloth, coffee filters, and even stockings to strain it. These nut bags are the BEST solution for making nut milks. They keep all the “grounds” safe in the drawstring pouch and are easily transferred to a container to keep or the garbage by simply turning it inside out. Which is also the best way to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahb

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to make almond milk using almond flour. I tried using a regular cheesecloth but ended up with flour in my milk. The Nut Milk bags solved that problem! I will definitely buy again but it'll be a while before I need to. These bags are built tough! For the price you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Works quite well for straining pulp from homemade juice.
customer_reviews.text: I used these bags to make green juice from vitamix vegetables. It does a great job separating pulp from liquid. It’s sturdy enough to last for multiple batches. It cleans easily, but the seams do not get completely clean. Dries super fast. I also bought some cheaper bags and those worked fine as well. I don’t like to keep for too many uses as I’m concerned about the food trapped in the seams. It may just be color from the veggies, but I can’t tell. Much cheaper than going to a retail store for fresh juice!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Chooch

customer_reviews.title: These work great and are soooo much easier than cheesecloth
customer_reviews.text: These do pretty much what you would want: a good job of filtering, clean up easily, and not impart any flavor to the finished product. I use them for making almond milk and for this purpose they are great.
customer_reviews.author: TechGuy 007

customer_reviews.title: Going nuts over this bag
customer_reviews.text: I really like this nut milk bag. I wanted to make soymilk so I went on a search to buy a bag with good filtering and this is it. Previously, I tried making soymilk with a cheese cloth and it totally failed. All the soybean pieces came through. With this nut bag, it actually filtered all the beans and allows me to have a good smooth soymilk texture. Overall, this is a must buy if you want smooth and healthy nut drinks. Pro: filters all the beans to leave a clean drink Con: may get hot when you pour hot liquids in the bag, but that's expected.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quinoa
customer_reviews.text: Got this to wash quinoa instead of trying to rinse it in a sieve. Works perfectly and can handle large batches. I plan on trying it for cauliflower as well, but haven't pushed it very hard so far, so can't attest to durability as some people have. Rinses easily, turns inside out easily. Happy for main reason of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Money Pit Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product for easy and delicious results!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I make nut milk and this product was super easy to use and resulted in awesome almond mylk that was delicious. Shipment was fast. The 2 bags are of great quality. Reusable. Easy to clean. But most importantly, the result was a delicious, smooth and silky mylk that was super easy to make. I recommend it to anyone looking to make any type of nut mylk at home. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: rmj

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for making oat milk and vegan cheeses etc.
customer_reviews.author: S'mone/Lovelle

customer_reviews.title: Cold Brew Coffee
customer_reviews.text: I use these almost exclusively for my cold brew coffee. They work great for that purpose - way less grounds or grit escaping. I've also used them to drain cauliflower before mashing it, and it was great for that as well. Hard to complain about the job these have done. I'll get more if ever I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Kenobi

customer_reviews.title: Flows threw good
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag to strain my Almond milk. After I ground the almonds with water, I first poured it into a fine mesh colander. This removed the majority of the pulp. I then poured the milk through the bag which resulted in a smooth (not gritty) almond milk. No squeezing of the bag was required. The bag is very easy to rinse out.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them once but the quality of the material feels good and the stitching on the edges is strong. Also, they're easy to clean and dry fast.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Larrosa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, so many purposes
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for making nut milk, but I also use to make juice from wild berries, strain farmer's cheese, make large batch tea, or anything that might require cheesecloth! They are easy to use, and fit easily over a large glass jar. The drawstring is also great for hanging things to drain overnight. I rinse in very hot water, then throw in the washing machine. SO easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag. Works great for Iced Coffee too!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually use this to make Iced Coffee. I like how easy it is to clean and the beans soak nicely without seeping through. It’s the second time I’ve ordered these because they worked so much better then the cloth ones i was using.
customer_reviews.author: Spillderbrains

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best! These are top quality extremely fine mesh bags
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best! These are top quality extremely fine mesh bags. They are also very soft which is uncommon for this type of bags. I use them instead of cheese cloth to make Kombucha and to drain aldmond and cashew milk.
customer_reviews.author: raquel velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Not just for nut milk anymore, helps make the best juice ever!
customer_reviews.text: I found the best way to juice is to use my Vitamix to break down the fruits and vegetables but needed to remove the pulp. I use theses bags to strain the pulp and to squeeze the last of the nutrients out. By far the best ones I have found. I can now make the best juices, create my one recipes. and have a juice that tastes better, is far heartier, is 100% pure, cheaper, and tons better than any thing you can buy in a store or at a market. We are now creating our ow. Favorites juices and creating fun names With the family.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Posner

customer_reviews.title: Love my bag!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my bag. I make my own oat milk and it worked great. It is so easy to clean and dries quickly for reuse. so much better than using my cotton kitchen towel, more sanitary. Good buy :)
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my Best Buys. I use the bag to make fresh juice. I have been juicing for health and weight loss but did not want to purchase a VITAMIX or Blendtech. I have a NINJA. Straining my blend through the nut milk bag works perfectly. I got the idea from YOUtube and decided to try it. I'm very pleased with the results. The clean up was easy as well. The nylon doesn't stain and definitely re-usable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Nut Milk Bag Ever
customer_reviews.text: I've used lots of other nut milk bags. This one has lasted, hands down, the longest. After you strain your nut milk through it, it is super easy to wash. It is the only bag that I've had that doesn't get super fine nut pieces stuck in its seams. Highly recommend. Also, I've been using it about a year and a half - amazing for a nut bag.
customer_reviews.author: kirsten smith

customer_reviews.title: Seam or seamless..
customer_reviews.text: The bag material is the best, filters perfectly. I do not like the seam that goes down the side around the bottom back up to the top. The seam does not have the integrity of the bag material. I would much prefer a seamless bag; just a circle of material with a drawstring around the circumference.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: New kitchen staple!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed!! This was the first nut milk bag I ever ordered and using cheese cloth and hating it this is a god send! So easy to clean. I blend raw celery and add it to the bag drain and wa-la! Celery juice!
customer_reviews.author: Ciera Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Ginger Aide Bliss
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Before, I used a fine mesh strainer and received too much fiber in my end product. But, with the nut bag, I get all juice without the extra pulp. The clean-up is a breeze, just rinse under warm soapy water and you're done. I would highly recommend this probuct. It Truly works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lifesaverjuice

customer_reviews.title: love this bag, durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: great bag, very durable. i ripped a couple tea towels so decided i should try a nut bag. this bag is very durable and is very fine so no pulp gets thru. it makes great soy and almond milk. cleans up real easy too
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Great for nut bilk and cold brew coffee
customer_reviews.text: I use this for nut milk, and it's a lot easier than anything else I've tried. A little harder to pour a ton of cold brew coffee through, but it works for this too. Best to wash with some oxyclean to get the brown stains out after coffee though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L. Siska

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I use this for juicing celery and it's very effective and easy to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Gramavicki

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The next best thing to use for juicing. Easy, quick to use and take along for travel. Well made and sturdy/durable cloth. Very pleased with this product. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria L.

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, great stocking stuffers for your juicing friends
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bags! I bought them to strain my smoothies to turn them into juice (rather than buying an juicer) and they work perfectly. They’re easy to rinse and fold up neatly for easy storage. I would highly recommend this product,even if only for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Lodwick

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great but I just wish they had one to offer that was even more of a fine mesh. I like to strain mine twice, one with regular mesh and one with super fine mesh
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received my purchase today and when I opened it the bags it's completely broken and inside the bag, the nut milk bag is completely broken too. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Chonlana Rakchop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for celery juice!
customer_reviews.text: I got rid of my juicer and didn’t want to purchase another. I blended my celery and I purchased these to strain my celery juice. Worked like a charm and easily cleaned. Perfect size too!
customer_reviews.author: T. Sullens

customer_reviews.title: Really works!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was super fast! I've never made nut milks before but this worked perfectly. It's easy to clean and use and came with some recipes which I started trying. Excellent choice! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: KKrein

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tofu
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law wanted some cheese cloth to make tofu. It was a bit messy. Then my son's best friend told us about your bags and what a difference!! The tofu even tastes better!!
customer_reviews.author: Kacee

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality
customer_reviews.text: Best bags to make almond milk and to strain teas etc
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I only have it one because I had to. Garbage. Anything and everything gets caught in the seem. I am going to start making my own.. horrible bags. And I've used many difderent kinds. These were the worst I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: James Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It was great to be able to squeeze as hard as possible and know the bag wouldn't give at all. Was able to get the liquid from the almonds easily. Can't wait to use it on zucchini.
customer_reviews.author: CDH

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I use these bags to make almond milk for the first time!! I was so excited to try them. If you were wondering, yes buy them. They work great! It’s literally pure liquid once you strain through these milk bags. These will be my go to for all my nut milk!
customer_reviews.author: kandigg2008

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to spend this much on a nut milk bag, but I think it was worth it. It comes with two sturdy bags that are pretty spacious for the amount of almond milk I’m making. It did the job well!
customer_reviews.author: nabil

customer_reviews.title: Better than cheesecloth
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag to filter the soy milk and it works great! I don't taste any of the ground with the milk. Will definitely buy the bag again.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Ng

customer_reviews.title: I like them better than cheesecloth!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for making DIY hair products and it works really well. I find it easier to use than cheesecloth, it’s neater to clean up and is more reusable, goes back to its shape more easily. It gets a bit tricky when trying to clean the seam because buildup can get caught there if you don’t clean it right away so I recommend cleaning right after you’re done using it and don’t let it dry up with food/product still on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bigglesworth

customer_reviews.title: Great for cold brew and the price was great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great deal! I use them for cold brew coffee and they work very well. As someone else mentioned some do the coffee grinds get into the stitching, but aside from that it cleans still cleans up well. Great investment to make cold brew!
customer_reviews.author: TH Houtman

customer_reviews.title: Greatttg so glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this nut bag. Some people said they had nut pulp stick on the seams but I didnt have that problem, yes if gets into the seams but all you have to do is run your fingers on it and comes right off! My oat and cashew milk came out smoothly
customer_reviews.author: AKM

customer_reviews.title: Average quality
customer_reviews.text: Both broke after a few uses @ the seams. I did give them a little squeeze to get out the last bit of liquid but I don't think it should break that soon. It was pretty cheap so I'm not too annoyed by the breakages.
customer_reviews.author: Team Midori

customer_reviews.title: Very happy to have found these
customer_reviews.text: Very strong seams. I make my own almond milk. Then use the pulp to make low carb crackers. These bags allow me to get almost all of the moisture out of the almond pulp.
customer_reviews.author: judi blake

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, high quality, good size for up to one quart
customer_reviews.text: excellent product, size is good for about one quart/liter at a time. Last a very long time, I'd estimate that one of these bags made well over 300 bottles before the seams were giving out from the squeezing.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Suarez

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time ordering this! :)
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product overall. I love that it's a 2-pack, so I've always kept one back strictly for coconut and the other for almonds, cashews etc. I've really come to love making my own nut milk at home! This was my second order, so you know I liked them! Would have given 5 stars with exception of one tiny thing. I know I squeeze hard to get as much liquid as possible out. I would recommend just reinforcing the seams a little bit more. Small portion of one of the bags started to come apart. I still use it, but am very careful how I apply pressure to the bag when squeezing.
customer_reviews.author: TazRider

customer_reviews.title: Broke during second use!
customer_reviews.text: The seam split the second time I used this.... NO idea how this product has such good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy, easy to clean and does a great job screening for chances (large and small). I would buy again. Recommended, without reservations.
customer_reviews.author: ZuluKat

customer_reviews.title: Smooth homemade nut milk
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with how easy this is. Sometimes the contents jump out of the top into the already strained milk. When this occurs, I simply strain again with the second bag, which goes much faster. The bags are easy to hand wash, and dry fast when stood upside down on a paper towel.
customer_reviews.author: Bobi

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well, a little tricky to wash between the stitching. I recommend though. I didn't look at the size when I ordered and it was bigger than I thought which turned out to be a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Antelo

customer_reviews.title: Creamer and smoother nut milk
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been doing my own nut and oat milks for long, however, this is the BEST nut bag I have had. It is so sturdy and fine that yes you have to squeeze more but the result is creamer and smoother than results from other bags. I am going to get more for all my DIY kitchen recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great For Straining
customer_reviews.text: These bags are great for straining just about anything you need to strain, will never go back to towels and cheese cloths
customer_reviews.author: Goodhealthfan

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these so that I can strain my celery juice in the mornings. I was using a cheese cloth but then someone suggested these. best purchase I made, they are so easy to use and the clean up it super quick!
customer_reviews.author: Chasity

customer_reviews.title: Great for straining Yogurt
customer_reviews.text: I use these for straining yogurt. I can get a full gallon of unstrained yogurt in one bag. Easy to clean and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: aaviator

customer_reviews.title: Makes the perfect juices and milk!
customer_reviews.text: I've used these bags to make my almond milk. It comes out creamy and consistent. I've left my almond milk in the fridge for about 5 days and there was no separation in the liquid. It stays homogenous. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: His Workmanship

customer_reviews.title: Celery Juice
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using these bags to strain celery after I’ve blended it to make celery juice! So far so good! I do recommend only using hot water to clean because the soap taste will linger if you wash them with dish soap (I use Seventh Generation).
customer_reviews.author: Justin C

customer_reviews.title: Decent for making oat milk.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first nut milk bag, which I use to make oat milk. It's super easy to use but I put too much muscle in to it and some oat chunk came through the seams at the bottom of the bag. Also it's pretty hard to get the build up of oat out of the seams as well. But overall it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Norman

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy; work well
customer_reviews.text: If you like to make your own nut milk, these bags are great. When making the milk, you really have to squeeze the bags hard to fully extract the liquid from the pulverized nut/water combination, and I've been impressed with how well these bags hold up with that abuse. They are a very fine mesh, so the finished product is well strained. If you've never made your own almond milk and have a Vitamix or similar blender, the fresh milk is so much better than the store-bought. If you've been tempted to try it, get these bags and go for it!
customer_reviews.author: gardengal

customer_reviews.title: Good for blender juice
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag to make blender juice- it’s taken about 20 rounds of squeezing and bending and twisting and pulling and has no sign of giving up yet. It’s quick to clean with a little soap, but I stick it on the top shelf of the dishwasher every few uses to help with discoloration (although using almost exclusively geeen veggies, it stays a bit green anyways.) Great price for a seemingly good-quality bag!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered these for cold brew making. They came in exactly as pictured. The quality of the bags is fantastic. I have only used one so far but it has endured many batches of cold brew so far. Easy to clean, which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: britty

customer_reviews.title: Hard to clean, but filters well
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bags the first few times I used them to make almond milk after blending with my Vitamix. However, after using 1 bag about 6-7 times, there are almond particles stuck in the seam. I'm not so sure it will be usable much longer. I still have 1 bag left. I wanted to love these bags and they do filter well. But, the fact that I can't get them clean is a major problem.
customer_reviews.author: Karen OT

product_meta.title: 2-PACK Best Nut Milk Bag - Restaurant Commercial Grade by GoNuts - Cheesecloth Strainer Filter For the Best Almond Milk, Cold Brew Coffee, Tea, Juicing, Yogurt, Tofu - BPA-Free Nylon 12”x10" Fine Mesh - Durable Washable Reusable - FREE Recipe E-book
product_meta.description:
CREATE THE SMOOTHEST NUT MILK OR CELERY JUICE WITH GONUTS BAGS 

Are you changing or enriching your diet? Nut milk & almond milk are healthy dairy substitutes that you can now easily make in your home! The GoNuts bags are the way to go about it. CHEFS JUST LOVE THEM!

Superb Material and Design 

The GoNuts bags are made of 100% safe, food grade and BPA FREE NYLON, unlike similar products. They've been heavily tested for professional RESTAURANT USE.

With TRIPLE NYLON STITCHING and ROUNDED BOTTOM, they are sized perfectly at 10’’ x 12’’ and are easily WASHABLE and REUSABLE washable. And their large round nylon drawstrings are ideal for gravity extraction and vegan cheese making.

Forget about flimsy cotton cheesecloth that gathers smell and mold. The industrial, super strong nylon of our bags, and their professional construction, constitute a kitchen tool that is durable and SMELL-FREE.

One Simple Kitchen Tool, So Many Uses 

Our bags’ extremely effective mesh of 100 microns can be put to use for more than just the perfect nut milk! ALSO USE THEM AS JUICERS BY REMOVING PULP FROM BLENDED FRUITS & VEGETABLES. MAKE CELERY JUICE. STRAIN VEGETABLE BROTH, BABY FOOD, MAKE NUT CHEESE & YOGURT OR COLD BREWED COFFEE. Find your own creative uses! 

Value For Money, Free EBook! 

Take advantage of our great price with our 2-pack deal. If you love nut milk, a single bag isn’t enough! It’s the highest quality/price ratio you will find on Amazon.

New to nut milk? We will send you a FREE RECIPE EBOOK with everything you need to know, plus many nutritious recipes that make use of the GoNuts bags!

Safe Buy 

We are confident you will love the GoNuts milk bags and you will have many uses for them. If you find anything not to your liking, simply return them for a full refund. No questions asked!

Get This Amazing Product, Click Add To Cart Now!

Use them for COLD BREW COFFEE, blender fruit juices, CELERY JUICE, nut cheese, vegetable broth, vegetable juicing and more! A real multi-use kitchen tool.
